priorities.goal: Identify Career Goals and Target Industry
priorities.whyImportant: Clear goals provide direction and focus for skill development and job searching.

milestones.description: Define short-term, medium-term, and long-term career goals.
successMetrics: Documented career goals with specific timelines and desired outcomes.

tasks.action: Research different career paths within software development.
Reflect on personal interests and strengths to align goals.

priorities.goal: Assess Current Skills and Identify Skill Gaps
priorities.whyImportant: Understanding skill gaps allows for targeted learning and development.

milestones.description: Create a skills inventory and identify areas for improvement.
successMetrics: Completed skills inventory with proficiency levels and relevance to goals.

tasks.action: List all technical skills (programming languages, frameworks, tools).
Research in-demand skills in your target industry/role.

industryTrends.trend: High demand for AI and machine learning skills (74% increase in the last year)
actionItems: Work on AI projects to build portfolio
Network with AI professionals in your area

industryTrends.trend: Increased remote work opportunities (98% of workers want to work remotely at least some of the time)
actionItems: Highlight remote work experience on resume

researchData.title: AI Career Trends 2024
researchData.summary: Demand for AI and machine learning skills has increased by 74% in the last year
researchData.impact: High demand for AI skills in the job market
actionItems: Work on AI projects to build portfolio
Network with AI professionals in your area
